text: The Next Karate Kid is a movie from 1994 starting Hilary Swank and Pat Morita as Julie Pierce and Mister Miyagi. It is a sequel to The Karate Kid Part III and the first Karate Kid movie not to have Daniel LaRusso as a character. title: The Next Karate Kid
